items.sentence: I'd really hoped I'd be able to see Tom dance.
I think that it might be difficult to do that.
I haven't yet read the article that Tom wrote.
Tom often write articles for travel magazines.
I'm definitely not going to be there tomorrow.
I've begun to have doubts that'll ever happen.
I didn't mean to imply what you did was wrong.
Tom didn't realize that Mary had to help John.
Greece was the cradle of western civilization.
Tom didn't get the promotion he was expecting.
